transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Yes sir, Namaskar.
Customer: Haan ji, Namaskar. Haan ji sir, yeh keh raha tha video meet pe connect kar sakte hain abhi?
Executive: Uh, ek system se karna padega ki woh ho jayega, mobile se ho jayega. Mobile se bhi ho jayega sir, par aapko screen share karni hogi waha pe.
Customer: Chaliye.
Executive: Theek mat karte hain.
Executive: Uh, toh main abhi link share kar du aapko?
Customer: Chaliye kariya.
Executive: Theek hai sir, main aapko link share kar deta hu.
Executive: Line pe rahiye sir.
Executive: Sir aapke mail pe na link gaya hai.
Customer: Check kariye.
Executive: Sir link mila aapko?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ji, sir usko join hoiye.
(silence)
Automated message: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to connect on a video meet.



Resolution:

- Executive shared a link on customer's mail.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- video meet, screen share, link
